channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-16754] Fix docker failed to build yetus/hadoop
item.description:
Docker failed to build yetus/hadoop

https://builds.apache.org/job/hadoop-multibranch/job/PR-1745/1/console

error message : 

07:56:02 Cannot add PPA: 'ppa:~jonathonf/ubuntu/ghc-8.0.2'.
07:56:02 The user named '~jonathonf' has no PPA named 'ubuntu/ghc-8.0.2'
07:56:02 Please choose from the following available PPAs:
07:56:02 'ansible': Ansible
07:56:02 'aria2': aria2
07:56:02 'atslang': ATS2 programming language
07:56:02 'backports': Backport collection

~jonathonf/ubuntu/ghc-8.0.2 not found in jonathonf's PPA, need to change other PPA
item.summary: Fix docker failed to build yetus/hadoop

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Would you merge the two commands

apt-get -q install -y --no-install-recommends ghc-8.0.2 \
apt-get -q install -y --no-install-recommends shellcheck \

into one?

apt-get -q install -y --no-install-recommends ghc-8.0.2 shellcheck \
aajisaka Thanks for the review. I uploaded a new patch.

Its doesn't apply any earlier -Do we actually need it there?

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #17751 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/17751/)
HADOOP-16754. Fix docker failed to build yetus/hadoop. (stevel: rev e573ea49085d396eb8130c476474399a90c4a55a)

  • (edit) dev-support/docker/Dockerfile

Yes. HDFS-15046 precommit fails in branch-2.9 due to the same issue.
pingsutw could you provide patch for earlier branches?
Thanks stevel@apache.org and weichiu, I upload patches for earlier branches
Committed to branch-3.1, branch-2.10, branch-2.9, and branch-2.8. Thank you pingsutw, stevel@apache.org, and weichiu.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-thirdparty-trunk-commit #4 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-thirdparty-trunk-commit/4/)
HADOOP-16824. port HADOOP-16754 (Fix docker failed to build (github: rev d0e90430daafa9bd27d8fa71560a99fc473533f8)

  • (edit) dev-support/docker/Dockerfile

pingsutw

I just try to install Hadoop 3.2.1 on my Mac and also encounter this problem. And I manually edit the docker file as what you did in the patch and solve the problem. Guess you can also provide the patch for 3.2.1
